name: Holiday Gift Box of Assorted French Nougat Candies in 5 Flavors in Gift Box - Featured on Saveur.com
description:
Share |
Delight yourself with the smell, taste, and texture of all 5 flavors of our French Nougats - Or give the gift of unique gourmet sweets - perfect for the holidays as Christmas gifts and/or stocking stuffers. **All Natural Gourmet Candies - No Preservatives, No Artificial Colors, No Artificial Flavors** Each box will come with generous pieces of the following Nougat flavors (total of 15 pieces per box). These come in a gift box- perfect for gift giving or as a culinary treat to yourself. 1. Black Cherry Almond Nougat - 3 piece 2. Cafe au Lait Almond Nougat - 3 piece 3. Pistachio Cranberry Nougats - 3 piece 4. Strawberry Ice Cream Almond Nougat - 3 piece 5. Vanilla Almond Nougat - 3 piece Egg whites, sugar, and glucose are whipped to a fine fluffy consistency to create our soft French Nougats. Afterwards, our current line of flavors (vanilla, cafe au lait, cranberries, strawberries, cherry) are mixed into the nougat. We then add our almonds (or pistachios), which we roast in small batches to bring out the fullness of its flavor. The smooth flavors of our nougat candy pairs perfectly with our fresh roasted almonds and pistachios- blurring the boundaries between candy and dessert. These nougats burst with flavor- deliciously soft, sweet, fruity and nutty. Each piece of candy is wrapped in a delicate clear thin layer of edible rice paper so that it does not stick to the candy wrapper. Edible rice paper is often used in confections- especially in Japanese candies. Our nougats are perfect as wedding favors, office gifts, teacher gifts, holiday presents, christmas gifts, stocking stuffers, hostess gifts, housewarming, parties, birthdays, anniversaries, and any special occasion - just convo us and we'll get back to you asap with any questions you may have. *Allergy Info*: Please note that this product contains milk, eggs, almond, pistachios, strawberries, cherries, cranberry, chocolate, coffee, green tea and edible rice paper- take caution if you are allergic to any of these items

name: Pistachio Cranberry Nougat - Soft -1/4 LB
description:
Share |
Pistachio-Cranberry French Nougats- Egg whites, sugar, and corn syrup are whipped to a fine fluffy consistency to create our soft Pistachio-Cranberry French Nougats. We then add dried cranberries and pistachios, which we roast in small batches to bring out the fullness of its flavor. The smooth texture and flavor of our Nougat candy base pairs perfectly with roasted pistachios and tasty dried cranberries- blurring the boundaries between candy and dessert. These nougats burst with flavor- deliciously soft, sweet, tart and nutty. Delight yourself with the smell, taste, and texture of our soft Pistachio-Cranberry French Nougats. Each piece of candy is wrapped in a delicate thin clear layer of edible rice paper; often used in confections- especially in Japanese candies. Please note that the rice paper melts upon contact with moisture so you can be sure that it will not affect the taste/texture of the nougat candies. ∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞ A review of our nougats is now up on ZOMG-Candy!, an excellent resource with wonderfully descriptive reviews of all things confectionery. click here to read ZomgCandy's review of our Nougats ∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞ *Allergy Info*: Please note that this product contains milk, eggs, cranberries, pistachio, and edible rice paper- take caution if you are allergic to any of these items

name: Strawberry Almond Nougat - Soft - 1/4 lb
description:
Share |
The Strawberry Almond Nougat - made with real strawberries - no artificial flavorings and no coloring has been added. These nougats are soft, fluffy, and tasty. The resulting flavor profile is smooth, creamy, and sweet, very much like strawberry ice cream - and having it with some almonds makes this a delicious and healthy treat! We invite you to taste the sweetness of the spring fruit harvest with our soft Strawberry Almond Nougats. This is a listing for 1/4 pound of our strawberry almond nougats. Strawberry Almond Nougats- Egg whites, sugar, and corn syrup are whipped to a fine fluffy consistency to create our soft Strawberry Almond Nougats. We then add our almonds and strawberries to create this delectable treat. The smooth texture and flavor of our Nougat candy base pairs perfectly with roasted almonds - blurring the boundaries between candy and dessert. These nougats burst with flavor- deliciously soft, sweet, and nutty. Each piece of candy is wrapped in a delicate clear thin layer of edible rice paper so that it does not stick to the candy wrapper. Edible rice paper is often used in confections- especially in Japanese candies. Our nougats are the perfect for wedding favors, wedding candy buffets, parties, gift-giving, birthdays, anniversaries, and any special occasion - just convo us and we'll get back to you asap with any questions you may have. *Allergy Info*: Please note that this product contains milk, eggs, and pistachios, strawberries and edible rice paper- take caution if you are allergic to any of these items

name: Black Cherry Almond Nougat - Soft - 1/4 lb
description:
Share |
We're pleased to introduce a new flavor to our collection of Nougats: Black Cherry Nougat Our Black Cherry Almond Nougats are made with large tasty Black Cherries from Michigan and fresh roasted almonds. These cherries are plucked when plump and ripe, then dried. We selected these Black Cherries because they are sweeter than the red cherries and they pair perfectly with our soft Nougat candies. Soft, creamy, sweet, and ever so lightly tart; these candies taste very much like Cherry Ice Cream, with the added treat of our fresh roasted almonds. The only other thing we wish we could add is hot fudge! This listing is for 1/4 pound of our Black Cherry Almond Nougat. Cherry Almond Nougats- Egg whites, sugar, vanilla, and corn syrup are whipped to a fine fluffy consistency to create our soft french almond nougats. We then add our almonds and sweet dried black cherries to create this delectable treat. Each piece of candy is wrapped in a delicate clear thin layer of edible rice paper so that it does not stick to the candy wrapper. Edible rice paper is often used in confections- especially in Japanese candies. Our nougats are the perfect for wedding favors, wedding candy buffets, parties, gift-giving, birthdays, anniversaries, and any special occasion - just convo us and we'll get back to you asap with any questions you may have. *Allergy Info*: Please note that this product contains milk, eggs, and almonds, cherries, and edible rice paper- take caution if you are allergic to any of these items
